noteContentFormat:
# {{title}}

> [!abstract] Comprehensive Summary
> {{"Provide 3-4 sentence summary covering ENTIRE content scope. Include beginning, middle, and end points."}}

> [!metadata] Source Information
> - **URL**: {{url}}
> - **Author**: {{author}}
> - **Published**: {{published|date:"YYYY-MM-DD"}}
> - **Captured**: {{date|date:"YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm"}}
> - **Word Count**: ~{{"Estimate word count"}} words
